Welcome text: Teamber is a new unique application that will help you manage your workflow more effective. Create tasks, work with your team and reach your goals."Coming together together is the beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success." - Henry Ford
The fifth advantage: the ability to get all tasks of specific team member
The seventh advantage: we always glad to help you
The first member description: Guided all team members to write correct and clean code. Helped with advice at all stages of application development. Fully participated in the verification of pull requests of participants
The second member description: Created a private repository for the team. Deployed the backend. Created user registration and authorization.
